document_data.name: Canthus
document_data.Description: The large moorhound was strong with thick brown fur and powerful legs. Canthus was more commanding than others of his breed with teeth the size of a person's little finger.
document_data.Possessions: Protected by the [[Chauntea|Goddess]], Canthus wore a ''[[torque of the Goddess]]''.
document_data.History: In [[1345 DR]], during the Festival of the Spring Equinox on [[Gwynneth]], [[Pawldo]] sold Canthus to Prince Tristan for 50 gp after a dramatic round of bartering.
